thread.title: Pastry Chef Creates ‘Gulliver’s Travels’ Inspired Miniature Worlds With Desserts
thread.title_full: Pastry Chef Creates ‘Gulliver’s Travels’ Inspired Miniature Worlds With Desserts

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Pastry Chef Creates ‘Gulliver’s Travels’ Inspired Miniature Worlds With Desserts
text:
Pastry Chef Creates ‘Gulliver’s Travels’ Inspired Miniature Worlds With Desserts Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! 
Matteo Stucchi is a pastry chef from Monza, Italy, who has won quite a following on Instagram by building playful miniature scenes using his desserts and “tiny people”. 
Inspired by Gulliver’s Travels , Matteo said he gets inspiration from other artists. “I get the ideas by seeing other artists on the web who create an interplay between objects and food; and from that, I focus on my desserts, in order to make them different and innovative in some way, using all my imagination to try to surprise my followers,” he told Reshareworthy.com. 
As you’ll see in his creations below, the “Lilliputians” are hard at work, building delicious confections and fantastical scenes that almost make the desserts too good to eat. Almost. idolcidigulliver 
Photos published on Reshareworthy.com with permission from Matteo Stucchi. 
You can see more of Matteo Stucchi’s work and follow him on Instagram @idolcidigulliver and on social media under #idolcidigulliver. Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! Like Us On Facebook!
